title: Beet and Orange Salad
introduction: This Beet and Orange Salad is a visually stunning dish featuring the vibrant colors of red beets, juicy orange slices, and fresh mint leaves. Itâ€™s perfect as a light starter or side dish, and can be made heartier with the addition of crumbled goat cheese or gorgonzola.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cut the beets into quarter-inch slices. Alternate the beet and orange slices on a platter.
Whisk the oil and lemon juice with salt and pepper to taste. Pour the dressing over the beets and oranges. Scatter the mint on top. Serve immediately.
